titleStmt.title: A defence of the Apologie of the Churche of Englande conteininge an answeare to a certaine booke lately set foorthe by M. Hardinge, and entituled, A confutation of &c. By Iohn Iewel Bishop of Sarisburie.
titleStmt.author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.
Jewel, John, 1522-1571. Apologia Ecclesiae Anglicanae. English.
Harding, Thomas, 1516-1572. Confutation of a booke intituled An apologie of the Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreate, at the signe of the Elephante, by Henry VVykes,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Cum gratia & priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
This edition has "foorthe" in line 4 of title page; last quire is 3R⁶.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and Harvard University Library.
Appears at reel 423 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 1899 (Harvard University Library copy).
